text:
After a change to the meta data, the content file is also backed up:

? content/live/97faa150-3ded-11db-9bb6-a8868d934a9c/en.meta.1199453956616.bak
? content/live/97faa150-3ded-11db-9bb6-a8868d934a9c/en.1199453956616.bak
M content/live/97faa150-3ded-11db-9bb6-a8868d934a9c/en.meta
M content/live/97faa150-3ded-11db-9bb6-a8868d934a9c/en.rcml

This certainly makes it easier to restore a previous version of the node, but it
uses more disk space than necessary, and causes a performance penalty.
creator: andreas@apache.org
